channel.title: Need help with a tiny or big problem
channel.description:
I added skill capes, hoods and stuff to my client class8.java
When i drop them u cant just click them to pick it up u have to right click. Is there any way i can change it to where u dont have to right click.
Here's a picture if u dont understand what im talking about. [img]http://www.freewebs.com/slashdelta/problem1.bmp[/img]
